name: KLX Energy Services Holdings, Inc.
description: KLX Energy Services Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of integrated energy services to the oil and natural gas industry. Established in 2018, the company has quickly risen to prominence by offering a comprehensive suite of services, including drilling, completion, and production-related solutions. Operating primarily in North America, KLX Energy Services specializes in providing advanced technology and equipment to support the exploration and production efforts of its clients. The company focuses on innovation and efficiency, leveraging state-of-the-art technologies to optimize operations and reduce costs for its customers. KLX Energy Services is committed to safety and sustainability, adhering to the highest industry standards while also implementing practices aimed at minimizing environmental impact. The company aims to enhance the productivity of its clients through tailored solutions and a dedicated workforce, driving value in a competitive and rapidly evolving energy sector. KLX Energy Services continues to expand its capabilities and geographic reach, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the energy transition.
